textContent:
1 1/2 ounces gin, preferably Amass
3/4 ounce blanc vermouth
3/4 ounce manzanilla sherry
1/4 ounce olive brine
Tonic water, to top (preferably Fever-Tree Elderflower Tonic)
Garnish: olive, lemon twist

Combine the first 4 ingredients in a highball glass with ice.
Top with tonic water.
Briefly stir once to integrate the ingredients.
Garnish with an olive and a lemon twist.

https://punchdrink.com/recipes/dirty-martini-highball
title: Dirty Martini Highball
